statements.sql: select * from `user_wallets` where `user_wallets`.`user_id` = 1 and `user_wallets`.`user_id` is not null limit 1
select column_name as `column_name` from information_schema.columns where table_schema = 'bullion_plus' and table_name = 'user_notifications'

insert into `user_notifications` (`type`, `user_id`, `message`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('DATA-BUNDLE', 1, '{\"title\":\"Data Bundle\",\"message\":\"Data Bundle request successful 100 NGN\",\"image\":\"http:\/\/localhost:8000\/backend\/images\/default\/default.webp\"}', '2025-05-30 04:16:28', '2025-05-30 04:16:28')

select `admin_has_roles`.`admin_id` from `admin_has_roles` inner join `admin_role_permissions` on `admin_has_roles`.`admin_role_id` = `admin_role_permissions`.`admin_role_id` inner join `admin_role_has_permissions` on `admin_role_permissions`.`id` = `admin_role_has_permissions`.`admin_role_permission_id` where `admin_role_has_permissions`.`route` in ('admin.mobile.topup.index', 'admin.mobile.topup.pending', 'admin.mobile.topup.processing', 'admin.mobile.topup.complete', 'admin.mobile.topup.canceled', 'admin.mobile.topup.details', 'admin.mobile.topup.approved', 'admin.mobile.topup.rejected', 'admin.mobile.topup.export.data')
select * from `admin_roles` where `name` = 'Super Admin' and `status` = 1 limit 1
select column_name as `column_name` from information_schema.columns where table_schema = 'bullion_plus' and table_name = 'admin_notifications'

insert into `admin_notifications` (`type`, `admin_id`, `message`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('DATA-BUNDLE', 1, '{\"type\":\"DATA-BUNDLE\",\"title\":\"Mobile topup request successful (USER)\",\"message\":\"Transaction ID : 1748556977,Request Amount : 100.00 NGN,Operator Name : MTN Data,Mobile Number : 07083838172,Total Payable Amount : 0.12 USD (iheonu6@gmail.com)\",\"image\":\"http:\/\/localhost:8000\/backend\/images\/default\/profile-default.webp\"}', '2025-05-30 04:16:31', '2025-05-30 04:16:31')
